articles.author: Nina Subkhanberdina, Jonny Hallam
articles.title: India arrests Kashmir resident in connection with deadly Red Fort bomb attack - CNN
articles.description: India’s National Investigation Agency (NIA) on Sunday said it had arrested a man accused of helping plan last week’s deadly car bombing near Delhi’s Red Fort, which killed at least 10 people and injured more than 30.
